title: Cursed Sapling
summaries: The Cursed Sapling is a Hardmode, post-Plantera pet-summoning item that spawns a Cursed Sapling to follow the player around. It appears as a small, dark blue tree stump with a jagged head, a jack-o-lantern face, and roots on which it walks. The Cursed Sapling is dropped by the Mourning Wood during the Pumpkin Moon event with a 2–20% (5–20%) chance depending on the current wave.

statistics.Tooltip: Summons a cursed sapling to follow you
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
